name: Cloudy day
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### About Cloudy Day
Cloudy day is a simple one control game where you tap to fly and avoid the black clouds, it is slow-paced game where the tension builds up. You can unlock different types of birds or even special skins. Try to reach the longest distance ever flown.

### About the Developer
I am a Highschool developer that makes his games on his free time, normally after school, I like making little fun games that I enjoy and would like to share. I started programming 2 years ago and have developed various games mostly in Unity C#. I make the art on all my solo projects.

### Support or Contact
Have any questions or suggestions?
Contact me at raptor0sp@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
